name: notecraft
description: A VS Code extension for note-taking and task management, built on Foam with enhanced workflow features.

notecraft.webview.showCompleted.markdownDescription: Whether completed tasks are shown or not in the webview.

notecraft.webview.completedStrikeThrough.markdownDescription: Whether completed tasks should have a line drawn on them in the webview.

notecraft.webview.showRecurringCompleted.markdownDescription: Whether recurring completed tasks are shown or not in the webview.

notecraft.webview.showRecurringUpcoming.markdownDescription: Whether recurring upcoming (not due) tasks are shown or not in the webview.

notecraft.webview.showPriority.markdownDescription: Controls whether priority is shown in the webview.

notecraft.webview.showCheckbox.markdownDescription: Controls whether checkbox is shown in the webview.

notecraft.webview.showNestedTaskCount.markdownDescription: Controls whether nested tasks indicator (like `0/10`) is shown in the webview.

notecraft.webview.showTaskDetails.markdownDescription: When true - show box on the bottom of the webview that shows selected task details.

notecraft.webview.notificationsEnabled.markdownDescription: When true - show notification after some actions (like task completion) in a webview.

notecraft.webview.fontSize.markdownDescription: Controls font size in the webview. [CSS Units](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-size)

notecraft.webview.fontFamily.markdownDescription: Controls font family in the webview. [CSS Units](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-family)
notecraft.webview.fontFamily.default: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Noto Color Emoji'

notecraft.webview.lineHeight.markdownDescription: Controls line height in the webview.

notecraft.webview.indentSize.markdownDescription: Controls visual indent of nested elements in a webview.

notecraft.webview.customCheckboxEnabled.markdownDescription: Whether checkbox is rendered as native input element or a custom styled element.

notecraft.webview.autoShowSuggest.markdownDescription: Show autocomplete when typing. (When disabled suggest can be called by `Ctrl`+`Space`)

notecraft.webview.focusFilterInputOnClic.markdownDescription: Focus filter input after clicking(selecting) any task.

notecraft.webview.customCSSPath.markdownDescription: Absolute path to custom CSS for the webview.

notecraft.webview.tagStyles.markdownDescription: Set different color for any tag in a webview.

notecraft.defaultFile.markdownDescription:
Absolute path to file that Tree Views or commands use when no editor is open that matches `#notecraft.activatePattern#`.

[**Pick default file**](command:notecraft.specifyDefaultFile). Supports using `${workspaceFolder}` variable substitution.

notecraft.defaultArchiveFile.markdownDescription:
Absolute path to file that all archived tasks will be moved to.

[**Pick archive file**](command:notecraft.specifyDefaultArchiveFile).  Supports using `${workspaceFolder}` variable substitution.

notecraft.defaultSomedayFile.markdownDescription:
Absolute path to file that is used as the "someday" file.

[**Pick someday file**](command:notecraft.specifyDefaultSomedayFile)

notecraft.durationIncludeSeconds.markdownDescription: When enabled - duration (editor, hover) includes seconds.

notecraft.autoArchiveTasks.markdownDescription: When enabled - will move tasks to archive file (on completion).

notecraft.confirmTaskDelete.markdownDescription: Show confirmation when deleting task from Tree View or Webview.

notecraft.activatePattern.markdownDescription:
Choose files that extension will operate on. By default activated on 3 files (todo.md, someday.md & todo.archive.md). Uses [Glob](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns). Examples:

Activate on any (.txt) file - `**/*.txt`.

Activate only on single file (todo.txt) - `**/todo.txt`

Activate on 2 files (todo.txt or task.txt) - `**/{todo,task}.txt`

notecraft.getNextNumberOfTasks.markdownDescription: Number of tasks returned by `getFewNextTasks` command.

notecraft.sortNestedTasks.description: Controls nested tasks sorting in Tree Views.

notecraft.suggestItems.markdownDescription: This extension will only autocomplete tags/projects/contexts located in **1** file. This setting allows you to add items and their description(markdown) to autocomplete in all files (where extension is active). Examples: `#tag`, `+project`, `@context`.

notecraft.counterBadgeEnabled.markdownDescription: Shows small badge to show a number of times the tag/project/context is present in the active document.

notecraft.progressChartEnabled.markdownDescription: Controls whether editor nested task decoration (pie chart) is shown or not.

notecraft.progressBackground.markdownDescription: Editor decoration for nested tasks progress (pie chart) background.

notecraft.progressForeground.markdownDescription: Editor decoration for nested tasks progress (pie chart) foreground.

notecraft.statusBarMainEnabled.markdownDescription: Controls visibility of status bar that shows next tasks to complete.

enabled.markdownDescription: Controls visibility of this status bar item.

hoverEnabled.markdownDescription: Controls whether or not to show hover for this status bar item

truncate.markdownDescription: If the message length is longer - crop it at the end. `0` to disable.

onClick.markdownDescription: Controls visibility of status bar that shows next tasks to complete.

notecraft.mainStatusBarItem.markdownDescription: Configure appearance/behavior of main status bar item (shows next task to complete).

enabled.markdownDescription: Controls visibility of this status bar item.

notecraft.progressStatusBarItem.markdownDescription: Configure appearance/behavior of the progress status bar item (shows only when active text editor matches `#notecraft.activatePattern#`) with text format: `1/3 33%`.

notecraft.addCreationDate.markdownDescription: When creating a task add creation date to it: `{cr:2020-04-30}`

notecraft.completionDateIncludeDate.markdownDescription: Whether to include date when completing a task: `{cm}` vs `{cm:2020-04-30}`

notecraft.completionDateIncludeTime.markdownDescription: When completing a task add date and time: `{cm:2020-04-30T09:11:17}`

notecraft.creationDateIncludeTime.markdownDescription: When creating a task add date and time: `{cr:2020-04-30T09:11:17}`

notecraft.closestDueDateIncludeWeekday.markdownDescription: When enabled - editor decoration that shows number of days to the due date adds the weekday name.

notecraft.autoBumpRecurringOverdueDate.markdownDescription: When completing overdue recurring task - replace the starting date with today's date.

notecraft.isDev.markdownDescription: For emulating dev mode. Most likely of no use to anyone, except the extension author.

notecraft.tabSize.markdownDescription: Number used for parsing nested tasks when indentation cannot be guessed (file is not opened in editor).

notecraft.savedFilters.markdownDescription: Filters that you can pick when applying a filter.

notecraft.treeViews.markdownDescription: Add more tree views with predefined filters.

notecraft.treeView.showBadge.markdownDescription: Whether or not to show due tasks counter badge for tree view container.

notecraft.treeView.useVscodeCheckboxApi.markdownDescription: When checked - will use vscode api to show checkboxes https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/issues/116141.

notecraft.labelDueSymbol.markdownDescription: Prefix for task that is due in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

notecraft.labelNotDueSymbol.markdownDescription: Prefix for task that that is not due in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

notecraft.labelOverdueSymbol.markdownDescription: Prefix for task that is overdue in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

notecraft.labelInvalidDueSymbol.markdownDescription: Prefix for task that has invalid due date in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

notecraft.labelFavorite.markdownDescription: Label shown when task has favorite `{f}` special tag. (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick)

notecraft.labelShowItems.markdownDescription: Show projects/tags/contexts in labels (tree view, notification, modal, quick pick).

notecraft.completedStrikeThrough.markdownDescription: Show strike-through text decoration for completed tasks in editor.

notecraft.setDueDateThisWeekDay.markdownDescription: Week day when using set due date command or suggest `SET_DUE_THIS_WEEK`.

notecraft.setDueDateNextWeekDay.markdownDescription: Week day when using set due date command or suggest `SET_DUE_NEXT_WEEK`.

notecraft.commentFormat.markdownDescription: Choose comment symbols (only works at the beginning of the line).

isWholeLine.description:
Should the decoration be rendered also on the whitespace after the line text.
Defaults to `false`.

rangeBehavior.description:
Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range.
Defaults to `DecorationRangeBehavior.OpenOpen`.
